pageContext.claim: “Trump Campaign Rejects Media Reports of Changed Pennsylvania Case....Just more Fake News. Harassment and exclusion of our Poll Watchers is a big part of our case. Unconstitutional!”
pageContext.analysis: Here, Trump cites a Breitbart news article on a Trump campaign news release disputing a Washington Post report that the campaign had significantly watered down its lawsuit seeking to challenge the results of the election in Pennsylvania. As our colleague Aaron Blake explained, the Post article was right, and the news release was just disingenuous spin to cover a faltering legal effort. (We're not sure whether Trump understands this, however.)
